alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 8:14PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Meade, northeastern Custer and central Pennington Counties through 845 PM MDT... At 814 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southeast of New Underwood, or 23 miles east of Rapid City, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Railroad Buttes around 825 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 67 and 92. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for southwestern and west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains
